title: IHE Patient Identity Cross-Reference for mobile
introduction:
## The IHE Patient Identity Cross-Reference for mobile (PIXm)
This IHE Implementation Guide provides RESTful transactions for mobile and lightweight browser-based applications to create, update and delete Patient Ressources in a Patient Identifier Cross-reference Manager and to query the Patient Identifier Cross-reference Manager for a list of patientâ€™s cross-domain identifiers assigned to the same patient person by the Patient Identifier Cross-reference Manager.

list.desc: Continuous Integration Build (latest in version control)
